message: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
author: A. A. Milne

message: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

message: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

message: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

message: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
author: Albert Schweitzer

message: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
author: George Eliot

message: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

message: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

message: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

message: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
author: Audrey Hepburn

message: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Nelson Mandela

message: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

message: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

message: It always seems impossible until it is done.
author: Nelson Mandela

message: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

message: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
author: Confucius

message: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
author: George Bernard Shaw

message: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
author: Dr. Seuss

message: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese Proverb

message: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

message: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

message: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

message: Life is about making an impact, not making an income.
author: Kevin Kruse

message: Two roads diverged in a wood, and Iâ€”I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference.
author: Robert Frost

message: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.
author: Edmund Burke

message: Whatever you are, be a good one.
author: Abraham Lincoln

message: I didn't fail the test, I just found 100 ways to do it wrong.
author: Benjamin Franklin

message: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
author: Albert Einstein

message: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
author: Babe Ruth

message: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

message: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
author: Booker T. Washington

message: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

message: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
author: Thomas A. Edison

message: Limit your 'always' and your 'nevers'.
author: Amy Poehler

message: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

message: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
author: Christian D. Larson

message: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
author: Plato

message: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

message: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
author: Vince Lombardi

message: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
author: Maya Angelou

message: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

message: The best way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

message: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
author: Dennis P. Kimbro

message: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
author: Zig Ziglar

message: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

message: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C. S. Lewis

message: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
